titles.title: Protecting Privacy in Our Homes Act
Protecting Privacy in Our Homes Act
A bill to require the Federal Trade Commission to promulgate regulations requiring manufacturers to give notice to consumers as to whether internet-connected devices contain cameras or microphones.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Protecting Privacy in Our Homes Act This bill requires manufacturers of internet-connected devices that are not specifically marketed as cameras or microphones to disclose to consumers whether a camera or microphone is a component of such device.
